DOC.brief_summary: Our aim investigate effect 12-week structured aerobic exercise fast 2 h glucose , insulin lipid concentration sedentary overweight subject impair fast glucose and/or impair glucose tolerance observe first time .
DOC.detailed_description: Study type : Interventional Study design : Randomized Endpoint classification : Changes fast 2 h glucose , insulin lipid concentration Intervention model : Parallel assignment Masking : Open label Primary purpose : Prevention dose response assessment exercise glucose lipid metabolism Condition : Prediabetes Intervention : Supervised exercise - The training session intervention group carry indoors 3 time week 3 month supervise exercise instructor physician . Each session last 60 min include 5-min warm-up stretching , 20-min walking speed 2-4 km/h depend participant 's physical condition , 5-min stretch balance training , 20-min walking , 10-min stretch balance training . After 1.5 month 5-min stretch balance training two 20-min walking exclude , walk time become 45 min . No intervention : control group ; couseling baseline . Participants control group advise continue usual physical dietary habit . Experimental : 1 -supervised exercise intervention . No intervention : 2 - standard counsel baseline .
DOC.criteria: prediabetes determine 2 hr oGTT functional limitation chronic disease might limit physical exercise test vigorous physical activity/exercise reveal questionnaire physician exam
DOC.keyword: Prediabetes , objectively measure exercise , glucose lipid metabolism , dose response , muscle metabolism .
